reviewText: I love all of Charlenes videos and own several. She always gives a great work out with tips on how you can make it harder or easier, and also gives good health and fitness information as you work out.

Love Charlene's workouts and this is a particularly good one, quite advanced for moderately active people but only in terms of effort, the choreography is pretty straightforward. Hard work but do-able.
I've been exercising to Charlene's step workouts for 42 Years!!!  Good step partners and good music.  Charlene also gives good advice as she steps.
